messages.title: LET'S GET BREXIT DONE
messages.content: and get on with our priorities.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: North Yorkshire Police have already started to recruit 200 new officers. We must combat the blight of drugs.
The redevelopment of Whitby Hospital and a new A&E at Scarborough have both been given the green light
I will campaign for better rail services and to keep the A64 upgrade in the Government's planned programme

issues.economy: Working with local businesses to build a strong economy and create jobs
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school

leaflet.personalStatement: A strong local voice for the Yorkshire Coast with a track record of service

images.caption: Robert Goodwill - A strong local voice for Scarborough and Whitby

leaflet.additionalNotes: Delivering record funding and investment for our hospitals, schools and police
